title: Mystery Gift
body:
I was just notified I received a  mystery gift from riot games. Never told me what it was or why. 

I did just update my laptop and maybe it was a mistake? Or am I missing something? 

Thanks

replies.body:
It was probs the **super cute** Worlds Pick'em Poro icon that was being sent out today in a few waves. 

Let me know if this was it! ^.^
I just got one too and it was a Summoner Icon for Worlds [Pick'Em](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#how-to-play)
